p: Among the cases confirmed by RT-PCR in Vientiane Capital, 85.7% and 62.4% were respectively serotyped in 2016 and in 2018 ( Table S1). The proportion of samples serotyped varied from year to year (from 28.2% in 2019 to 76.6% in 2014), but the proportion of samples from Vientiane Capital remained constant over time (between 50% and 65%) ( Table S1).
